overview: A socially inept fourteen year old experiences heartbreak for the first time when his two best friends -- Cappie, an older-brother figure, and Maggie, the new girl with whom he is in love -- fall for each other.
tagline: It's about falling in love.  For the first time.
cast: Corey Haim|Kerri Green|Charlie Sheen|Winona Ryder|Courtney Thorne-Smith
